definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Which had been searching the Barents Sea for weeks, was on its way home.
sentences.chinese: 在巴伦支海搜寻了几个星期之后，正在返航途中。

sentences.english: A sea battle was fought in the Barents Sea between German and British fleets .
sentences.chinese: 德国与英国皇家海军舰队在巴伦支海发生战斗。

sentences.english: The small ship, Elkor, which had been searching the Barents Sea for weeks.
sentences.chinese: 小船“埃尔科”号在巴伦支海搜寻了几个星期之后。

sentences.english: It splits the disputed part of the Barents Sea into two equally sized areas.
sentences.chinese: 依据协议，巴伦支海争议海域一分为二。

sentences.english: It will allow significant exploration of the region for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在巴伦支海，如此重大的勘探是史无前例的。

sentences.english: Gunner had no qualms about Reno's mission of spying on Soviet submarine maneuvers in the Barents Sea.
sentences.chinese: 刚纳对到巴伦支海执行监视任务并不担心。

definition: Aleutian Islands (trailing 2250 km southwest of Alaska almost down to Kamtchatka)
the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)
